attributes.action: Ban unelected organisations in Cornwall from taking court actions on behalf of the Cornish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Cornwall a number of organisations have taken court actions on behalf of the Cornish, without ever asking the Cornish if they want such action taken. Such actions be organisations such as the Stannary "Parliament", the "Cornish convention" or the "Cornwall Commonwealth Games Association" could have profound and long lasting implications for Cornish people, ones we would rather not have. We petition the prime minister to make it illegal for unelected bodies to take actions in court and elsewhere on behalf of the people of the county of Cornwall, without first holding a referendum on whether the people actually want the action taken.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
